title: Markets, Diamonds, And Autonomous Driving
itunes:title: Markets, Diamonds, And Autonomous Driving
description:
Phil Palumbo, CEO, CIO, and founder of Palumbo Wealth Management, discusses inflation, investing, and gives his market outlook for 2022. Angus Pacala, CEO of Ouster, talks about his company and autonomous driving technology. Dave Harden, founder and President of Summit Global Investments, discusses investment strategies amid volatility. Amish Shah, President of ALTR Created Diamonds, discusses how diamond prices are expected be impacted due to the war in Ukraine. Hosted by Matt Miller and Katie Greifeld.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
